title: Carla & Schnuu Watch Face
summary: Carla and Schnuu will make the time fly by.

description: The ever cheerful Carla and her grumpy octopus Schnuu are inseparable. With this watch face you will gain insight into the exciting daily routine of the two. If it's going fishing with the scooter or turning on the flashlight on under the duvet, Carla and Schnuu will make the time fly by.Illustrated by the incomparable Melanie Schober, these two chibi figures will not just make Manga Fans smile.The Carla & Schnuu Watch Face includes:- a watch face for smart watches (Android Wear)- a homescreen widget for smart phones
descriptionHTML:
The ever cheerful Carla and her grumpy octopus Schnuu are inseparable. With this watch face you will gain insight into the exciting daily routine of the two. If it's going fishing with the scooter or turning on the flashlight on under the duvet, Carla and Schnuu will make the time fly by.

Illustrated by the incomparable Melanie Schober, these two chibi figures will not just make Manga Fans smile.

The Carla & Schnuu Watch Face includes:
- a watch face for smart watches (Android Wear)
- a homescreen widget for smart phones
comments: Amazing I love the design for this watch face, the graphics and art are great!
Best time faceapp A very userfriendly timeface widget. Thanks
A home screen widget for smart phones.... Its really cool.
Fun Clock app.This is a great clock to download. I love it.
Simple and creative  app.Best featured app for every one...
Great application This app is nice-designed. I'm really impressed with it. Highly recommend. Great application!
recentChanges: - Shifting lunch time for daily activities
